input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
H410 Cute 3 pcs Crystal Turtle Wild Animal Charm Pendant

Item features:
Crystal Rhinestone Charm Pendant
Turtle Design
The measurement: approx. 3.5m (H) x 2.0 cm (W) x 1.0cm (D)
Fashion Jewelry Accessories
Good for making jewelry, necklace, keychain, charm phone plug
Condition: Brand new and never used

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This is a brand new and in perfect condition Fashion Jewelry Accessories Crystal Rhinestone Charm Pendant. It is 3.5cm (H) x 2.0 cm (W) x 1.0cm (D) and comes in a turtle design. You can use it for making jewelry, necklaces, key chains and phone charms.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
